summary: Adds ancient orcish ornamented wooden bow to the game (new mesh + new texture).
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ac7b3e][size=4][b]Twister[/b][/size][/color]
(Ancient Orcish Bow)


[size=3]They say there was a very skilled ancient Orc smith. He saw a strange weather phenomenon once - moving spiral column of clouds which left all trees in its path twisted. He took one of those branches and made a weapon which... Ah, forget it! I\'m not good with the stories.[/size]


[b]    Description:[/b]

    Adds ancient orcish ornamented wooden bow to the game (new mesh + new texture).

    It has stats similar to original Ebony Bow, can be upgraded as well (orcish smithing perk required) and has no any enchantments.

    You can find it in the ruins of Northwind Summit (if you have no idea where this place is then just search www.uesp.net page for any info about its location).


[b]    Installation:[/b]

    » Copy TwisterBow.bsa, and TwisterBow.esp files to \"Skyrim\\Data\" folder
    (default path from Steam\'s main folder is: Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data).

    » In Skyrim Launcher choose \"Data Files\" and make sure that checkbox near TwisterBow.esp is selected.

    » Start the game and load your any save - go to Northwind Summit to find it.
    And if you aren\'t of an adventurer type and want to obtain the bow quickly just execute in game\'s console the following command:

    startquest axTwisterBowQuest

    and the bow shoud be added to your character\'s inventory.


[b]    Removal:[/b]

    » Delete the same files you copied previously during the installation proccess.


[b]    Known Issues / Compatibility:[/b]

    This mod adds only a new stuff. It doesn\'t overwrite or change anything from the original game thus incompatibility with other mods has been reduced to minimum.
author: Artisanix
